attributes.additional_details: President Al Bashir of Sudan has committed  genocide in his nation. He has supported groups like the Janjaweed who [along with the Sudanese army]have murdered 400,000 people and displaced 2,500,000 people from their homes.The international criminal court issued an arrest warrant on his person for war crimes in 2009 and he has resisted justice. As a signatory to the genocide convention and the Rome statute, HM government has a legal and moral responsibility to bring this autocrat to trail. Thanks.
